## IMathMatrix.HidePlaceholders property

Hide the placeholders for empty matrix elements Default: false

```csharp
public bool HidePlaceholders { get; set; }
```

### Examples

Example:

```csharp
[C#]
IMathMatrix matrix = new MathMatrix(2, 3);
matrix.HidePlaceholders = true;
```
